pr_title: New doc section for FT documenting internal config properties

timeline.message:
New doc section for FT documenting internal config properties.

Signed-off-by: Santiago Pericasgeertsen <santiago.pericasgeertsen@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText:
We already use the share icon for another topic. What about one of these at https://material.io/resources/icons
(I filtered using warning for some inspiration)

error
error_outline
warning
report
sync_problem
timeline.author: tjquinno
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -250,7 +250,14 @@ backend:
                     - "mp/cors/hide*.adoc"
                   includes:
                     - "mp/cors/*.adoc"
-
+            - title: "Fault Tolerance"
+              pathprefix: "/mp/faulttolerance"
+              glyph:
+                type: "icon"
+                value: "share"

timeline.bodyText: I could not build the site locally without adding the - list-item indicator in front of includes on this line.
timeline.author: tjquinno
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -250,7 +250,14 @@ backend:
                     - "mp/cors/hide*.adoc"
                   includes:
                     - "mp/cors/*.adoc"
-
+            - title: "Fault Tolerance"
+              pathprefix: "/mp/faulttolerance"
+              glyph:
+                type: "icon"
+                value: "share"
+              items:
+                  includes:

timeline.author: tjquinno

timeline.bodyText: I realize we don't have other FT doc, but would it be more accurate to call this Fault Tolerance Configuration (in the header-1 level name, pagename, and description document attributes)?
